title: ISic001724. I.Sicily inscription 001724
body:
Facsimile Images

((cross_uninterpreted)) Μνιμίο[ν ---]
ΤΑ Θεοδό[ρου---]
ΟΔΟΡΟΥ[---]

Apparatus criticus

Text from Orsi 1893

English translation

This is the monument of Theodoros....of ---oros

commentary

Orsi apparently implies that line 3 "[sic.]" repeats the letters in line 2?

bibliography

  • Orsi 1893 298 no. 76 https://biblio.inscriptiones.org/epig10001715
Licensed under a Creative Commons-Attribution 4.0 licence.
